trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There were no other sightings in Tulsa on or around April 1st 2008
Summary: I saw two UFO'S in Tulsa 4/1/08 one was hovering in place and the other one was moving
divs: sighting detailsi was on my way home from watching a friends band at 1:15am on 4\1\08 when i noticed something very unusual hovering in the sky. i was on a highway circling downtown tulsa right next to osu tulsa, where just to my north i saw three very bright lights. these lights were in the shape of a triangle and were hovering close to the ground. i was first amazed at the size of the lights and the perfect stillness. i then tried to make since out of it. it was close enough that i should have been able to make out a body. i am used to seeing helicopters and planes fly over my neighborhood being close to the police station and a small airport. this ufo looked to big and still to be a helicopter or a plane, and there were no flashing lights anywhere. as i turned onto another highway the ll tisdale pkwy i continued to keep an eye on it. when i looked to the nw i noticed another object just like the 1st one, but this one was moving very slowly away from me and to the west. i watched it come to a complete stop and then move back the same direction from which it came. when i looked back for the other one it was gone. this 2nd one moved right by me and i tried to follow it but trees got in the way. after seeing these i cant stop looking at the sky. i got this weird feeling like they were scanning the ground, or mapping it out. i hope that someone else saw what i saw that night and made a report. the only car i remember passing was a police officer that was parked in the center median of the ll tisdale and looking for speeding cars. i hope he saw the same things i saw and reported it.
